language.Add.description:
LANGUAGE [Client/Menu] Adds a language item. Language placeholders preceded with "#" are replaced with full text in Garry's Mod once registered with this function.

[string] placeholder
  The key for this phrase, without the preceding "#".

[string] fulltext
  The phrase that should be displayed whenever this key is used.

language.GetPhrase.description:
LANGUAGE [Client/Menu] Retrieves the translated version of inputted string. Useful for concentrating multiple translated strings.

[string] phrase
  The phrase to translate
